title: The Falls Trilogy Boxed Set
description: This boxed set includes all three books in The Falls Trilogy and is over 800 pages of adventure, humor and a little romance.The Fates have chosen... Will she be ready?Kali Atwater is eagerly awaiting two things: finishing sophomore year in college and celebrating her upcoming twentieth birthday. The evening before Kali's special day, she finds out that the enchanting land she's been dreaming about every night for the last year isn't a fantasy at all. It's her birthplace.Every twenty years, a new generation of Guardians return to Arvata, bringing life back to their world by renewing the magic of the Falls. Now it's Kali's turn, but sinister magic has made its way into her new home, preventing the Falls from replenishing.Soulmates, magic, and overcoming evil become Kali's new reality as she figures out just who she really is. Find out how her journey unfolds in The Falls Trilogy.
author: Heather  Renee
